sentences.en: A lamb goes astray on a forked road.
sentences.cn: 歧路亡羊.

sentences.en: An error , the breadth of a single hair , can lead you a thousand li astray.
sentences.cn: 差之毫厘, 谬以千里.

sentences.en: Don't worry, I won't lead you astray.
sentences.cn: 别担心, 我不会引你走歪路的.

sentences.en: For ye were as sheep going astray; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls.
sentences.cn: 你们从前好像迷路的羊。如今却归到你们灵魂的牧人监督了。

sentences.en: He had led many children astray before he went to prison.
sentences.cn: 他入狱前将许多儿童引入歧途.

sentences.en: His figures are all astray.
sentences.cn: 他的数目字全不对.

sentences.en: His passion for horseracing carried him astray.
sentences.cn: 他对赛马运动的酷爱使他误入歧途。

sentences.en: How can millions of dollars go astray?
sentences.cn: 几百万美元怎么可能不翼而飞呢？

sentences.en: If it hadn't been for him, we would have gone astray.
sentences.cn: 如果不是他的话, 我们就迷路了.

sentences.en: Many items of mail being sent to her have gone astray.
sentences.cn: 寄给她的许多邮件失落了.

sentences.en: She was shunned by her former friends after she went astray.
sentences.cn: 她偏离正道后,从前的朋友都回避她.

sentences.en: Such ideas will only lead the world's people astray.
sentences.cn: 这种思想只会把世人引入歧途.

sentences.en: The boy was led astray by bad companions.
sentences.cn: 这小孩被坏伙伴诱入歧途.

sentences.en: The first thing we did was look for errors in our experimental design and for every conceivable scenario that could have led us astray.
sentences.cn: 我们的第一个动作是寻找的实验设计哪里出了差错，并想遍每一种可能让我们误入歧途的状况。

sentences.en: The judge thought he'd been led astray by older children.
sentences.cn: 法官认为他已经被那些年长的孩子们带坏了。

sentences.en: The letter had gone astray in the post.
sentences.cn: 这封信寄丢了。

sentences.en: the money had gone astray.
sentences.cn: 钱不知去向。

sentences.en: The testimony would inflame the jurors, and lead them astray from the facts of the case.
sentences.cn: 证言会激怒陪审员，使他们背离案件事实。

sentences.en: We drove east to Rostock, where my map led me astray.
sentences.cn: 我们驱车向东去罗斯托克，但地图却给我指错了方向。

sentences.en: We missed the track and went astray.
sentences.cn: 我们走错了道,迷路了.

words.tran_cn: 迷路的；离开正道的；不对头的

trans.tran_cn: 迷路的， 误入歧途的
